Reviews.Title: Luv It
Reviews.Author: Ebony "hardshelly"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. I bought it for my mum. The packaging was excellent.  I love the colour and the style.  Her previous phone, the E63 was great but this nokia C3 is elegant, stylish and very easy to use. Its weight is lighter and it is neater to carry around.  Very good phone.  It works well in my country.  I am so very sorry I did not get one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Gread phone
Reviews.Author: Nokia fan
Reviews.Content: I had an amazing experience with the seller, the shipping was supper fast. the phone is great just a few things that are different from the Nokia e63 I had before. this phone has no notification light, and the menu is different. but other than that its great for messaging, unlike Nokia e63 it has the convenience of conversation messaging, and the battery is good, but I feel that Nokia e63 had a better battery.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Andrea P. Eiley
Reviews.Content: SO Love this phone!! Really Love the color!! Works Great too!! Thinking of buying another one for my daughter.She wants the pink one!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Blackhorsecatie
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my 13th birthday in China, and it was limited edition. I was not impressed with the other basic colors Nokia had to offer, but this one instantly caught my eye! This phone is absolutely smashing. Gorgeous color/design, great keyboard, easy settings, lovely display, etc. The Wifi on this baby is so handy, and pretty fast. I love the many shortcuts on this phone, it really is so easy to use. You can download Facebook and Gmail onto it. It's also extremely affordable! Nokia has done it again.The only drawback is that the beautiful swirly design on the back chips like crazy. I'm thinking about getting a case for it, which is a shame because the color and everything is so beautiful.I really recommend this phone, especially for teens that text a lot. Easy to use, cool features, and of course, gorgeous. I really can't say enough good things about it.

Reviews.Title: Hacker's Guide to the C3-00
Reviews.Author: DarthRad
Reviews.Content: Months later, I ask myself, why did I pick this phone and get so wrapped in figuring out how to tweak it until it finally worked like I want?  I guess I just like solving puzzles and taking things apart.Initially, I was mainly looking for a phone with a full QWERTY keyboard, not a touchscreen keyboard, which I hate, that could do Wifi without requiring a data plan with my cellphone carrier (AT&T;).  So many of the full keyboard cellphones nowadays have Wifi, but will not allow you to do Wifi without also having a data subscription.The C3-00 fulfills these requirements.  The biggest downside to this phone is that Nokia has pretty much abandoned all further support for this phone and its old Symbian operating system.  That means no easy way to get the apps you need to do simple things like blocking certain incoming phone numbers.However, because this is a simple, basic, and slightly smart phone (think of it as a C-minus level smartphone), that has been out for some time, the phone is relatively cheap to buy and use, and numerous tweaks are out there posted on the internet that allow you to tweak it.  If you do want a data plan through AT&T; for example, this costs only $10 a month, as the phone uses the older slower GPRS/EDGE  data network.The phone also takes up to a 16Gb micro-SDHC chip to play your music  and store your photos for the 2MB camera (you need the latest firmware, earlier firmware versions only supported 8GB).  It will play MP4s by the way (my son figured this part out).Having said all that, the next thing that has to be said is:  BUYER BEWARE!  There are several DIFFERENT versions of this phone!  I have purchased around 10 of these phones now (one has failed).  Here are the versions I have encountered and what can or needs to  be done to fix them:1.  Regular American/Western standard English QWERTY keyboard.  May come locked or unlocked.  Found on Ebay, AliExpress, etc.  Firmware level highly variable from the  6.-- series on up to 8.70.  RM614  8.71 is the last Nokia firmware update, but there is no American or European version.  The closest you get is the English language Australian/New Zealand/Singapore English QWERTY firmware which works fine.  If you are lucky, you will get one of these with this 8.71 firmware.  Depending on the firmware  level, this type of phone is the closest you can get to having a ready-to-go phone that needs minimal programming/hacking to work properly.2. English QWERTY keyboard with (usually) 8.71 international firmware of unknown type with  non-English characters (Cyrillic?)  for certain of the uppercase keyboard buttons which do NOT correspond to what is on the keyboard.  These phones need to be re-flashed with the English QWERTY 8.71 firmware (see above) to work properly.3. Partial QWERTY keyboard with (usually) 8.71 international firmware of unknown type.  The uppercase keyboard buttons for certain buttons are blank.  These uppercase buttons will generate the same set of non-English characters as type #2.  These phones need re-flashing of the firmware and a replacement full-set English QWERTY keyboard.  As of this writing, these keyboards can be found on Ebay and elsewhere, and there is a Youtube video that shows you how to take your phone apart to replace the keyboard (need a T4 or T5 Torx screwdriver)4. Cyrillic version QWERTY keyboard with same 8.71 international firmware.  Same fixes needed as type #3.5.  AT&T; Go-phone.  These have a dark blue body and silver keyboard.  Comes with 3.63 firmware WITHOUT WIFI!!!  These were sold really cheap for a time by Walmart, and are now often found on Ebay and elsewhere.  Re-flashing the firmware to 8.70, 8.71, whatever, will place a Wifi soft key on this phone, and allow it to seek out and identify nearby Wifi hotspots.  This indicates that these phones do indeed still have the Wifi chip in them.  However, the MAC addresses of these Go-phones have been wiped out and set to ZERO, meaning that the cellphone WILL NOT CONNECT EVER TO ANY WIFI SOURCES!!!  So far, I have not discovered any hacked software out there that will allow you to reflash a MAC address onto the Wifi chip on this cellphone.  So these AT&T; Go-phones have very effectively had their Wifi permanently castrated by Nokia, most likely at the behest of AT&T;, to force users to use an AT&T; data plan.In regards to re-flashing the firmware:1.  Get the cracked Phoenix Software.  Need a good quality micro USB cable to connect to your PC computer.  See Commentary section below for websites where you can download this software and instructions for how to use it.  The original genuine version required a dongle, so you need the cracked version(s).  Phoenix WILL NOT WORK on 64-bit Windows 7!!  It will work on 32-bit Windows XP and Windows 7.  For those of you righteous legal purists, know that Phoenix Software is a now defunct software no longer being sold or supported, and so the cracked version is not defrauding anybody of their rightful profits.2.  Some sites still tell you to download the Navifirm software to get the latest firmware from Nokia.  Well, Nokia shut down their website for the Navifirm software in early-mid 2013, so forget about using Navifirm.  See Commentary section below for best websites currently to get the last firmware version 8.71.Other reviews have already discussed how to get the phone set up properly to send MMS Multimedia text messages.  Go to the Commentary section below for a full update on the details.  One KEY FACT not mentioned by other reviewers so far is that you need to ALSO change the IMEI number with your cellphone carrier in order to get the Multimedia text messaging to work.Also in the Commentary section is a website description of how to get the Wifi to work.Onwards, to the Commentary section ...

Reviews.Title: Bad cameras
Reviews.Author: gnaynou
Reviews.Content: Cameras take very bad photo, i mean when i try to take a shot, in the screen will have like a nice color but once make the shot, the color turn to a different one, also not good for taking picture at night, you will see object in the screen but when make the shot, it's all dark.One good about this cameras is it's water resistant, i mean one time i was talking on the phone while using the toilet, i accidentally drop the phone into the toilet, about 10 sec. sock in toilet water, i will then hurry in sock in clean water and wash for like a min. and then after drying it and clean with alcohol i test it and work great like same.

Reviews.Title: Has worked ok!
Reviews.Author: SebastianA
Reviews.Content: It has worked ok. It is not the most advanced cellphone, but my mom handles it well. At least you can install whatsapp

Reviews.Title: not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Michelle Harris
Reviews.Content: This product works fine as a phone, but am still having difficulties downloading WhatsApp and getting online.  Bought as a gift for my niece and needless to say we have since changed phones.

Reviews.Title: Nokia
Reviews.Author: ALEXANDER MENDEZ
Reviews.Content: el producto es excelente y nos llego en buen estado. calificado asi como con cinco estrellas, todo bien en la entrega

Reviews.Title: Nokia C3
Reviews.Author: Mary in the Morning
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone very much. It is easy to use and it seems to be good quality. I've dropped it (not recommended!) a few times and it's still in one piece. I would recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Dropped calls everywhere!!!
Reviews.Author: Michelle K.
Reviews.Content: The only place that I can utilize this phone is in my home town....once I get ten miles out of town...in any direction...I lose service totally.  When I am on the highway going to Pittsburgh PA, that should not happen...I also should not have dropped sercvice in the city itself.  You would think the cell phone towers r a plenty in the city.  My son and husband have the same phone service as I do and its not the service, bc they have no problems with dropped calls...EVER!!!  and I never had dropped call issues until I purchased this cell phone....never again!!  My first two cell phones were NOKIA and the were superb...not this one, thats for sure!  Whoever refurbished this cell phone had no clue what they were doing!!

Reviews.Title: For phone and e-mail it is great.
Reviews.Author: BorisG
Reviews.Content: If you need it only as phone and for short e-mails on the road, it is great! Of course it is not a competition to iPhone or Galaxy S III, but it is small, light, nice keyboard. I used it both in US (AT&T;) and in Israel (Orange). Connected automatically as soon as the SIM card was in.

Reviews.Title: NOKIA C3 ACACIA PURPLE
Reviews.Author: Juana
Reviews.Content: LOVE THE PHONE, COLOR AND EASY TO USE FEATURES.  ONLY DRAW BACK IS THE FONTS AVAILABLE ARE MED & LARGE, HOWEVER NORMAL LOOKS LARGE.  SMALL FONT ONLY AVAILABLE ON TEXTING.  OTHER THAN THAT GREAT PURCHASE.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: lixu
Reviews.Content: Good product, excellent price, My first cell is made by Nokia and this is my sixth one, still Nokia. I really love Nokia, its quality is alwasy trustble.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C3 Acacia (Purple) International Unlocked Phone No US Warranty
Reviews.Author: Héctor
Reviews.Content: El producto no viene con software en español así que si quieren el producto deben actualizarle el software a español o utilizarlo así. Además el celular no vino ni con el cable de datos ni con la memoria USB pero el vendedor me devolvio el dinero de lo que costaban esos artículos.De ahi el celular es muy lindo y llama mucho la atención, a mi prima le enacanto bastantisimo por el color y por el diseño, en especial porque el color del celular no se encuentra en ningún lado de Ecuador.En fin es un excelente producto.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: solofercho
Reviews.Content: excelente telefono sumamente liviano, muy funcional, y no se cuelga como en otras marcas suele suceder, el envio sin novedades,vendedor recomendable ya que el producto llega en perfectas condiciones,

Reviews.Title: ME ENVIARON UNO EN OTRO IDIOMA
Reviews.Author: DANIEL
Reviews.Content: COMPRE UN TELEFONO EN AMAZON POR WIRELESS EVERYTHINKS Y ME ENVIARON UN TELEFONO CON IDIOMA DIFERENTE. LO COMPRE PARA VENEZUELA Y SU CONFIGURACION ES DIFERENTE (Nokia C3 Acacia (Purple) International Unlocked Phone No US Warranty)

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: ADri
Reviews.Content: would i be able to use these phone outside the US, with and gSm sim card from anothr country, because i dont want to buy before i'm completly sure it works
